duties_responsibilities.duty: Teach topics related to information studies, including computational thinking, data analytics, python programming, data engineering, web development, cloud computing, social computing, user-centered design, AR/VR/XR, and sociotechnical cybersecurity.
Incorporate hands-on, real-world projects from government, non-profit, and industry experts into the curriculum.
Provide guidance and mentorship to students in order to facilitate their learning and practical application of the subject matter.
Facilitate online and in-person teaching options for students, ensuring the delivery of high-quality educational experiences.
Collaborate with industry experts and practitioners to enhance the academic environment and relevance of the curriculum.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in Information Studies, Computer Science, or a related field (Ph.D. preferred)
